result.execSummary:
The defendant Demario D Kidd was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess w/Intent-THC (<=200 grams), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1m)(h)1.
  • Adjudged Delinquent Possess Firearm, a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 941.29(2)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Defendant must submit a DNA sample as required by law.  Defendant must pay all outstanding fees and court obligations.  If supervision is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and governmental entities for the balance due.  Collections may include income assignment.
Obtain and maintain full-time employment OR attend school full-time, may be a combination of both to equal 40 hours per week to the extent that it doesn't jeopardize disability benefits.
No alcohol or controlled substances, random UA's at discretion of agent.  Do not associate with any known drug dealers or users.  Defendant may only take medication pursuant to a prescription.

Comply with all Child Support and Family Court orders.  No contact with Sergio Williams or Sir Nile Williams.  Counseling, treatment, services as deemed appropriate by agent. Defendant must obey all rules and regulations of probation.  Firearm warning given.  Voting prohibited until sentence is complete and civil rights have been restored.

timeConds.notes: Credit for time served is to be applied only in the event of revocation.  With Huber for work and school. DO NOT REPORT LATE OR UNDER THE INFLUENCE OF ALCOHOL OR CONTROLLED SUBSTANCES.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY REQUIRED.

Credit for time served is to be applied only in the event of revocation.  With Huber for work and school. DO NOT REPORT LATE OR UNDER THE INFLUENCE OF ALCOHOL OR CONTROLLED SUBSTANCES.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY REQUIRED.

Court Reporter: Jennifer Schmaling.  Defendant Demario D Kidd in court with attorney Donald L. Conner.  Sharon Ann Riek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

State had not additions or corrections to PSI, Chapter 950 not applicable, has reviewed the e-mail Atty Connor provided.
Defense had one correction to PSI regarding alcohol consumption

State recommends 6 years (3 + 3) on count 4; and on count 2, imposed and stayed sentence with consecutive probation. 
Defense requests withheld sentence with probation, 9 months conditional time.  

BTC:  ct 2:  withheld sentence - probation 2 years
no alcohol or c/s unless prescribed by a physician, random UA's & breathalyzers
full time employment/school to the extent it doesn't jeopardize his disability benefits
comply with child support or family court orders
no association with Williams' (2)

ct 4:  withheld sentence for probation of 3 years
concurrent to ct 2
same conditions

TO BE SIGNED WITH GRANDFATHER, DANNNY JOE KIDD, DOB 05/24/1959 WITH PHOTO ID. Ct 1: 961.41(1m)(cm)3-PCS w/intent - Cocaine; Ct 2: 961.41(1m)(h)1-PCS w/intent THC; Ct 3: 961.42(1)-Maintain Drug Trafficking Place; Ct 4: 941.29(2)(b)-Adjudge Delinquent Possess Firearm. No contact with the co-defendant.   Defendant ordered not to possess or control any weapons.  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any controlled substances.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report directly to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.   The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance. Defendant must seek psychological care and follow through with any recommendations. Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.
Status conference on August 24, 2015 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Demario D Kidd in court with attorney Antoinette L. Rich.  Defendant Demario D Kidd in custody.  Sharon Ann Riek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Patricia Schaefer.
Defense asks for bond to be modified to cash/co-signature with grandfather, Danny Kidd. Defense has gotten some information from RUSD. The Court conducts a colloquy with Mr. Danny Joe Kidd, DOB 05/24/1959. The State does not object

BTC: bond may be modified to co-signature bond with Danny Joe Kidd, DOB 05/24/1959. Deft must seek psych care and follow through with any recommendations. All other conditions previously ordered remain.  Status conference scheduled for August 24, 2015 at 09:30 am.
